name: Video Downloader For Threads
description: Do you love watching videos on threads.net, the new app from Meta where you can share text updates and join public conversations? Do you wish you could download your favorite videos and watch them offline or share them with others? If so, then Video Downloader For Threads is the extension for you. Video Downloader For Threads is a simple and easy-to-use extension that adds a download button below every video on threads.net. Just click the button and the video will be saved to your computer in MP4 format. You can choose the quality of the video, from low to high, and the download speed will depend on your internet connection. Video Downloader For Threads is compatible with Firefox 89 and above, and it respects your privacy and security. It does not collect any personal data or access any other websites. It only works on threads.net and it does not interfere with any other features of the app. Video Downloader For Threads is free.
